tool_description: An API that allows you to take beautiful images of your source code by sending data in the form of JSON, and getting back an image.
name: Carbon Image
title: Carbon Image

api_list.name: Get Image
api_list.description: This endpoint sends an image back based on user data sent to the API in the form of JSON.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://carbon-image.p.rapidapi.com/get-image"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "carbon-image.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://carbon-image.p.rapidapi.com/get-image"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "carbon-image.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
